results.title: DOWNLOAD Love Blocks Graph Chart Pattern - Afghan
results.description:
*** BUY 2 (NON-"CUSTOM" ORDER) PATTERNS, GET 1 FREE ***
My listing is a graph pattern NOT the finished product.

This  pattern can be used in cross stitch, single crochet, half double crochet, afghan stitch (tunisian) crochet as well as knitting.

Graph Size 120x150 AND 150 x 200 stitches 

Size depends upon hook/needles as well as the stitches’ tension. 
Be sure to check your gauge before starting.
Rows, columns, border or edging can be added to make the end product larger.

There are no row by row instructions. Each square counts as a stitch.  You count and follow the grids on the graph as you go. 

If you would like this graphic in larger or smaller stitch dimension, feel free to let me know. I would be more than happy to accommodate.  

SPECIAL REQUESTS/CUSTOM ORDERS: 
Please do not hesitate to contact me regarding special projects. I will gladly incorporate your personal ideas into existing graphs or start from square one on a new design specifically for you. 


The PDF files are both black & white symbols as well as color block.

If you are new to crochet I can include basic tips on starting the pattern as well as tips on changing and carrying colors.  Email me should you need help while working through the pattern.


IF you would prefer to receive a hard copy via USPS there will be a printing/postage charge.

All sales are final. No returns, refunds or exchanges. If you have any doubt in what you are purchasing please contact me with any questions before doing so.

 
©2013 Made Especially 
All rights reserved on pattern graphs and content in this listing. Seller claims rights on custom orders. Finished products from my patterns may be sold.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Vinyl wall art,  Live Laugh Love Decal - Bedroom Wall Decal, Inspirational Quote, Wall Decal
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Vinyl wall art,  Live Laugh Love Decal - Bedroom Wall Decal, Inspirational Quote, Wall Decal

These decals are easy to apply and are removable leaving no damage to your wall. Vinyl decals are a great way to decorate your home, nursery, child's room, kitchen, or any room in your home! 
*The image is for display/example purposes only and may not reflect the actual size of the item. Please refer to size measurements for specifications.

Easy-to-read, step-by-step application instructions included with each order. If this decal comes in multiple colors each layer will have registration marks to help with alignment. there are many videos online that show how to apply this decal.

If purchasing more than one, please give complete instructions for each design and color. If no color is chosen the decal will be in black.

**IMPORTANT INFORMATION**

Wall designs will stick to most smooth flat surfaces including finished wood, metal, paint, glass, plastic, furniture, appliances, doors, windows, laptops, mirrors and much more. The decals will not stick to carpet or fabric.

*Decals may not work on some surfaces with Teflon, stain guard or Zero VOC Low Odor paints. If your paint can says VOC You may have some problems getting the decals to stick to the that surface. in some cases and due to different decal designs, temperature, humidity, oily or dusty surface area, textured surfaces, specific paints, glossy, low VOC or VOC free and oils from hands or tools may cause some difficulties with the installation, peeling, or applying your decal(s). 

Please note: For freshly painted walls please allow up to 45 days for the paint to cure.

Please visit our Etsy store at http://horsefeathersdecals.etsy.com
Horse Feathers Decals and more…..

results.title: Mantra Necklace - Crystal Layering Necklace - Infinity Circle Necklace - Beaded Crystal Point Necklace
results.description:
This listing is for (1) crystal layering necklace. These mantra necklaces are specifically designed to bring you the daily reminder you need, whether that's to love yourself and love others or to live life for yourself.  These infinity circle necklaces remind the wearer that their limits are infinite. This beaded crystal point necklace will help guide the wearer and lift them to a higher emotional state. 

[[ NECKLACE SPECIFICATIONS ]]
✦100% handmade with love from start to finish!
✦Custom length chain. 

[[ CARE INSTRUCTIONS ]]
✦This necklace should definitely be taken off before showering, swimming, or engaging in work outs and other strenuous activities. Keep away from chemicals and strong perfumes. If treated with care, this necklace will be long lasting.

[[ CRYSTAL HEALING PROPERTIES ]] 
✦Amethyst is a very powerful stone that removes negative energies and blockages caused by such energies and thoughts. Amethyst helps put you in tune with your crown chakra. The crown chakra is where ideas are born and creative flow is centered. Amethyst allows increased creativity and flow of ideas and keeps them from being hindered by negative energies.  
✦Quartz is the strongest healer, cleanser, and vibration amplifier of all the stones. Quartz helps heal emotional scars and cleanse the mind of negative thoughts. Quartz helps amplify surrounding vibrations and energies to make the wearer feel more connected to their environment. 
✦Aventurine stimulates the heart chakra. Aventurine heals the heart to promote a well-being and calmness throughout the body. Aventurine is a very positive stone. It is a great protector against environmental pollution by helping to absorb electromagnetic smog. This stone also promotes empathy and compassion and helps to diffuse negative situations.
✦Garnet is associated with the root chakra and is known to help balance and remove negative energies from all the chakras and the aura.  Garnet is a protecting stone known for keeping travelers safe, protecting against evil, and preventing nightmares.  It is also used to release bad karma. Garnet helps promote trust and faith which is another reason why it goes great with the root chakra. 
✦Black Obsidian is the stone of truth.  This stone will help you uncover truths about your life and your love.  It will help promote honesty both in yourself and in others around you. It will help shatter illusions and uncover lies so you can walk a straighter path in life. 

[[ SHOP POLICIES ]] 
✦ https://www.etsy.com/shop/daydreamersmenagerie#policies
Please make sure you read all shop policies before purchasing. These policies have important information about returns, exchanges, and international shipping.

[[ DISCLAIMER ]]
✦Disclaimer: These crystals and gemstones are NOT to be used in place of medical advice.  The healing properties of these crystals are based on centuries of spiritual practices, not medical science. If you have serious health concerns, please seek help from your healthcare provider.
